name: JavaScript/TypeScript
shortDescription: Master JavaScript and TypeScript to build scalable, interactive applications on both client and server sides.

name: Express With Node
shortDescription: Master Express and Node.js to build fast, scalable server-side applications with robust routing, middleware support, and high-performance.

name: MongoDB
shortDescription: Master MongoDB to efficiently store, manage, and scale data for modern applications with flexible, JSON-like document structures.

name: React/Next
shortDescription: Master React and Next.js to build fast, scalable, and dynamic web applications with seamless server-side rendering and optimal performance.

name: MERN Stack
shortDescription: Learn the full MERN stack, mastering both front-end and back-end to build dynamic, full-stack applications.

name: Nest js
shortDescription: Master NestJS to build efficient, scalable, and maintainable server-side applications using TypeScript.

name: HTML and CSS
shortDescription: Master HTML and CSS to create structured, responsive web pages, ensuring a solid foundation for building user-friendly websites.
